subSections.title: Kanji
Readings
Compounds
Etymology 1
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|めし|yomi=k}}

The {{m|ja|連用形|tr=ren'yōkei||stem or continuative form}} of verb {{m|ja|召す|tr=mesu||to [[call]]}}.<ref name="DJR"/>

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|yomi=k|めし|acc=2|acc_ref=DJR,SMK2,ZAJ}}

subSections.title: Noun
Usage notes
subSections.text: This is an informal way to refer to food, and {{m|ja|食う|tr=kuu}} is a correspondingly informal way to say "[[eat]]".

subSections.title: Derived terms
Proper noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-pos|proper|めし}}

# {{surname|lang=ja|A=a|nodot=1|sort=めし}}

Noun

{{ja-noun|い.い|hhira=いひ}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=いい|archaic}} [[cooked]] [[grain]]s, ''especially'' [[cooked rice|cooked]] [[rice]]
